In England, in the seven days to 19 May, there were 12,374 new confirmed cases (22.0 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 12 May, there were 12,048 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 3% (326 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 24 May is 3,897,815 (6,924.9 cases per 100,000 population).
